name: A lot of... zombies!
description:
#QUARANTINEJAM

Let's drive the Syringe-Drone to heal the population, but stay away from infected people...  there are a lot of zombies outside!

CREDITS:

- Concept, Coding and Graphics by Simone "SempliceAgrodolce"

- Music: Black Rock Loop by [www.marcelofernandezmusic.com]

https://marcelofernandezmusic.itch.io/action-music-pack

- Special thanks to SviluppareGiochi community
